title: World Congress of Psychiatry 2022
description: WPA is happy to announce that WCP 2022 will be a hybrid congress experience, providing you the option of participating both in person and virtually at your convenience. We are excited that most of you will be undoubtedly willing to travel and meet us in Bangkok for the congress. However, for those of you who might not be able to take the trip, we do not want you to miss out on our excellent scientific program, meeting world leaders in the industry, and establishing new professional relationships, and therefore we will be offering you an opportunity to join us virtually.
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
